name: 莎拉·安·舒尔茨
name_full: 莎拉·安·舒尔茨 Sarah Ann Schultz
introduction: Sarah Ann started her career in modeling when she was 16 and worked internationally for several years. She moved to Los Angeles when she was 19 and began pursuing her dream of acting. Sarah has starred in several Indie films opposite Cuba Gooding Jr., Christian Slater and Sean Bean. She produced her first feature film The River Murders, in 2011 starring Ray Liota, recently released by Sony Pictures. Sarah has also been developing other exciting projects and has plans to open her own production company in the very near future. Producing, acting and being involved in projects that educate, inspire and have the power to change the way people view the world have become her passion. Sarah's greatest accomplishment is her son Dominic.
